channel.title: Path annoying
channel.description: i re installed jdk6u2 and refreshed my path(forgot why) and it works fine except now i gotta use the run.bat for the mopar client which is really annoying.. CLASSPATH = Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%; PATH = Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin ^^^^ stupid question, forgive me
